name: Don't touch the shredder, Jim.
description:
You are Jim.
Your job is maintaining the municipal park.
You have to do many things at your job.
None of those things is touching the shredder.
Get to work, Jim.

This game was our entry for Ludum Dare 33 ("You are the monster").

Please report any bugs you may encounter
(including a screenshot, if possible)

The game currently has Dutch and English language options.

Credits:
Jan Tuts — Programming, UI & Sound (BFXR)
Anri Vanhoutte — Art & Sound (soundscapes)

Tools:
Engine: Unity 5.1 (C#)
Graphics: Photoshop CS5
Font: Amatic Bold by Vernon Adams
Sound: BFXR + soundscapes composed from free audio samples

Be sure to check out our other works:
Anri: @AnriVanhoutte on Twitter
Jan: JanTuts.tumblr.com
